actions.Multiattack: The gray render makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, the target must succeed on a DC 16+1d8 + 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is prone an additional 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage is dealt to the target.
